tool_description: an API that returns UFC fighter rankings for each weight class, as well as Pound-for-Pound rankings for both male and female fighters
name: Current UFC Rankings
title: Current UFC Rankings

api_list.name: Current UFC Fighter Rankings
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the current UFC rankings for all fighters, both Pound-for-Pound and by weight class.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://current-ufc-rankings.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "current-ufc-rankings.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://current-ufc-rankings.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "current-ufc-rankings.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
